field.name: vehicle terrain parameters
field.definition: the following fields modify the way a vehicle drives over terrain of this material type.

field.name: ground friction scale
field.help: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

field.name: ground friction normal k1 scale
field.help: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

field.name: ground friction normal k0 scale
field.help: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

field.name: ground depth scale
field.help: depth a point mass rests in the ground

field.name: ground damp fraction scale
field.help: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick
